problem.markdown: 1. The default counter file is ___________ ( ) File 4 ( ) File 3 ( ) File 2 (x) File 5 2. A typical counter counts from 0 upto a predetermined value, called the _________ . ( ) Accumulated value (x) Preset value 3. Any data file, which is greater than _________ can be assigned as an additional counter. ( ) File 6 (x) File 7 ( ) File 8 ( ) None 4. In word zero of the counter element, bit 10 represents (x) UA bit ( ) UN bit ( ) OV bit ( ) None 5. In default counter file, how to address the counter’s 12 preset value? (x) C5:12.PRE ( ) C5:12/PRE ( ) C5:12-PRE ( ) All
